name: Jaaaaaaannnnnnü´∂üèª
greetingText: I really love you your the most and I do genuinely the most for you!
wishText: May bhagwaan ji always be with you! 😉
textInChatBox: Happy anniversary to us!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I should do something
text5Content: You are Special , frankly telling this time that I am not able to do something very special  as these times have been very hard for me still mera bacha this is a small present for you  because this has to be the most special moment of ours, just see how time flies , it was 21 Feb 8:41 PM night where I proposed you and you said yes within few minutes , that moment was like butterflies are there in my stomach , that time was really hard for me and someone accepting to be with me at that moment was like a miracle for me , maybe god planned it for me that a cute little princess gonna come in your life and she is going to take you out of these hard times ,I still remember that you didn't said i love you instantly to me , you said I love you to me on a very special day for me i.e. 24 Feb that's how you know how to keep me happy , you never let me alone in hard times , you were there no matter what when there was no one , remember how it went from text to our first call on 23rd Feb , I remember that , we both were very shy to talk then came my bday you sent me a beautiful note which I still have with me at a very safe place , you called me that night too and wished me bday , it was like my first bday when i was not at home , i was feeling dull because none knew about my bday in hostel as I never want other people who are not close to me to come out for me , for me my parents were everything , then you came , despite of all that only you 3 knew about my bday at 12 AM night and only you 3 wished , I was about to cry as every year my bday was celebrated by me, mummy and papa, only we 3 in a very special way , but I was not with them that time still it felt good the reason was you , i mean i was not there with you but still it was like i have my first (and I want you to be my last) love with me whom I can say anything , I have someone other than my parents in this world who loves me at par with them , and not only you loved me , I had someone then whom I can love , I had someone to whom I can say anything and express my all happiness,sadness , grief, achievements and failure , I was feeling kind of blessed, it went very fine with you , you used to casually send me your cute pics , I was never attached to someone's smile, I really didn't care much about girls before, you are the only girl whose smile has my heart ,your pics with the cutest smile in the world melts me and of course it makes me smile , it went all good , we had our first video call which went a little naughty too üòÇ
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
